parameters.name: BackupRegionId
parameters.description: The region where the anti-ransomware backup service is located.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: When performing a paginated query, set the page number for the current page. The default value is **1**.

parameters.name: MachineRemark
parameters.description: The identification information of the server protected by the anti-ransomware policy. You can enter the IP address or instance ID of the server.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of data entries to display per page in a paginated query.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
Backup status. Values:
- **completed**: Success
- **error**: Failure
- **canceled**: Closed
